edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Hand contains an ArrayList of Cards and an int representing the value of the hand

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      No-arg constructor
      Hand(Card c1, Card c2)
      Two-arg constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(Card c)
      adds a Card to the ArrayList of Cards and keeps track of whether or not it was an ace
      java.lang.String displayBestValue()
      returns a string displaying the best hand value
      java.lang.String displayHandValue()
      returns a string displaying the hand's value(s)
      Card getFirstCard()
      gets the first card in the hand
      int getHandValue()
      gets the value of the hand with aces counted as 1
      Card getSecondCard()
      gets the second card in the hand
      int getSecondHandValue()
      gets the value of the hand with aces counted as 11 or returns -1 if the value of the hand exceeds 21 with aces counted as 11
      boolean hasBlackjack()
      calculates whether or not the hand has blackjack
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString returning the hand

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
